name: cannery
description: Cannery is a simple inventory management web app to track pantry goods and expiration dates. It is ideal for reducing food waste and organizing household food stock, with an easy-to-use and mobile-friendly interface.
features: Pantry Inventory: Track household food stock and pantry items. Know what you have.
Expiration Tracking: Monitor expiration dates to reduce food waste. Save money.
Mobile-Friendly: Responsive interface works on all devices. Check inventory anywhere.
Food Waste Reduction: Prevent spoilage with expiration alerts. Sustainable living.
Easy Organization: Simple system for household food management. Stay organized.
Self-Hosted: Keep your inventory data private. Complete control.
